signal.tp:docstring: This signal is emitted when we discover that a Ytstenut service has changed or cleared its status on one one of the devices on the local network. The DiscoveredStatuses property will have been updated before this signal is emitted.

tp:docstring.p: This is a sidecar object on a connection manager, which allows Ytstenut services to expose their current status, such as name, state or other info to interested parties on the local ytstenut network.
This object also keeps track of the various Ytstenut statuses which are advertised on the local network.
